name: Penguin Breakout
description:
The game is about being a penguin on a mission. Our dear penguin named Kowalski has grown tired of his little cage, and therefore wants to escape from his captivity. The primary purpose is to escape in the various Levels. You have to pick up keys and avoid enemies. The idea is that different items spawn in the Levels, and you then have to gather them together to escape. You then have to use the different things together to get ahead in the levels.

The challenge is, in certain Levels, that there will be enemies that one must prevent.

Controls in the game are the normal WASD keys.
